ygData.subject: Re: goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: <Ah, yes, half elf druids are great, even if I am as stupid as an unequipped wood elf ;)> Hmmmmm... not sure if a care much for this crack!!!
ygData.messageBody:
<Ah, yes, half elf druids are great, even if I
am as stupid as an unequipped wood elf
;)><br><br>Hmmmmm... not sure if a care much for this crack!!!
haha<br><br>True-- there are TOO FEW quests for druids!!! I love
doing quests, and learned early on that i'd have to do
other people's quests (ie. CB belts and pads) growing
up in Kelethin, if I wanted to do any. One good
thing about being a 1/2 elf is that you can start in
Surefall, where the quests are better (well, at least there
ARE quests there, other than a stupid "go out and
fetch me some rusty weapons...haha stupid newbie!"
quest). <br><br>OH-- I am still trying to complete the HE
cleric Symbol of Tunare quests-- have 3 ghast hearts
after about 30 kilss. Are druids SOOO powerful that
they don't deserve great quests at all
levels?????<br><br>Xela Orcbane <br>Druid of the 32d season<br>Leaving no
graves to defile--unless OT goons are about
